stage_id: Item ID corresponding to this animal

name: Spirit Rabbit
desc: A spiritual rabbit with a naturally clever temperament, snow-white fur, containing weak spiritual power, gentle and easy to tame

name: Demonic Wolf
desc: A fierce demonic wolf tribe, huge in size, possessing powerful demonic power and sharp claws and teeth

name: Qingyun Deer
desc: A gentle spiritual beast inhabiting the plains, with an all-blue body and jade-like antlers, good at sensing spiritual qi changes

name: Shadow Leopard
desc: An agile hunter in the wild Southern Border, with a body like a shadow and sharp claws and teeth, skilled at stealth hunting

name: Azure Sea Dragon Turtle
desc: An ancient spiritual beast of the boundless azure sea, with a shell like green jade, able to control seawater, having an extremely long lifespan

name: Stone Armored Bear
desc: A strong guardian of the Qingfeng Mountains, with fur as hard as a rock, immense strength, and a simple and honest nature

name: Wind Speed Horse
desc: A majestic spiritual beast galloping across thousands of miles of green fields, with wind-born hooves, lightning speed, and flowing mane

name: Lava Lizard
desc: A fire-attribute spiritual beast in the Lava Volcano, with scales red as fire, able to swim in magma and spit flames

name: Poisonous Miasma Frog
desc: A highly poisonous creature from the Foggy Swamp, with colorful body patterns, able to release deadly poisonous gas, skilled at hiding

name: Earth Shaking Divine Cow
desc: A giant demonic beast with ancient bloodline, fur as hard as iron, causing the ground to shake with every step, with immense strength

name: Ice Spirit Bone Snake
desc: A cold-blooded demonic beast living deep in the permafrost, its body composed of translucent bones and frost, silent, able to freeze prey instantly
